prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green eyes and red wings.
I want a flying Pokemon that has an insectoid appearance and unique coloration.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a dragonfly, showcasing bright colors and speedy traits.
Make a tiny bug Pokemon that thrives in forests with distinctive wing patterns.
Imagine a small winged Pokemon that can camouflage with its surrounding environment.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of a dragonfly and a vibrant color palette.
Show me a Pokemon with characteristics of both insects and flying creatures.
